articles.description: "Mike," the controversial Hulu drama about boxing legend Mike Tyson, details his over-the-top lifestyle with pet tigers and pigeons. How much is true?
articles.content:
Spoiler alert! This story contains details from the first two episodes of the Hulu miniseries "Mike." 
Hold onto your ears.

articles.title: Olivia Wilde says she split from Jason Sudeikis for her 'health and happiness' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actress, 38, is currently involved in a custody battle with the Ted Lasso star, 46,  over their children together, son Otis, eight, and daughter Daisy, five.
articles.content:
Olivia Wilde has blasted the double standards surrounding the reaction to her split from Jason Sudeikis, claiming that he's seen as a 'hero', while she's considered to be an 'absentee mother'.
